title: Portfolio Website
description: A personal portfolio website to showcase projects, skills, and experiences. You're looking at it right now!

title: PetPals
description:
ðŸŒŸSecond place hackathon project.
An anonymous online platform designed to help users reflect on their emotions and connect with others in a supportive and uplifting environment.
features: Safe space for mental health discussions
goal: PetPals was created during a 24-hour hackathon with the theme of peace and inclusion. It was built with the belief that no one should have to face their mental health challenges alone. Too often, people keep their struggles to themselves, unsure of where to turn or worried about being judged. This project creates a safe and anonymous space where users can openly share their feelings, reflect on their emotions, and find comfort in knowing that others may be going through similar experiences. By encouraging kindness, empathy, and genuine connection, PetPals aims to break down barriers around mental health and foster a supportive community where everyone feels heard, accepted, and valued.

title: FitQuest
description: A fitness tracking application that helps users create custom workouts, control workout sessions, and track their favorite workouts.
goal: FitQuest aims to make fitness accessible and engaging for everyone by providing personalized workout experiences and community support.

title: RevRentals
description: A database-driven platform showcasing the integration of a relational database with a front-end application for managing rental properties.
goal: RevRentals demonstrates the power of well-designed databases in creating efficient rental management systems for both property owners and tenants.
